activities: In order to provide services under our CourseLeaf product, we may collect given name, surname, email address and login name.  This information is collected at login time from a client's authentication system, and when forms are filled out by client administrators.  This information is used to manage user accounts in our software, to contact users of our software via email, and to display the user information to themselves and other users when utilizing our software.
personaldata: login name, given name, surname, email address
privacyprograms: a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
